tweet: Warren Buffet is a value investor, not a trader. In no way would I ever compare myself to him but I invest in Chainlink because of the same principals:  1) Strong fundamentals 2) Cheap price right now 3) I understand everything about it 4) Long-term outlook by me & the team  https://t.co/we9R02pqPR

Ran out to my storage unit in bleached-out sweatpants and 3" of visible men's boxer briefs because I "wasn't trying to impress anyone," but joke's on me because I locked myself out and had to climb the 8' chainlink fence in front of three random bros and they were VERY impressed
